messages.form_label_name: Please fill the official name of the organization/individual  for the masternode:
messages.form_label_name_des: name will be displayed in the voting page
messages.form_label_location: Please indicate the location of your headquarters:
messages.form_label_sn: Please list all your media accounts or community channels
messages.form_label_sn_des: At least one media account(Weibo/Twitter/Telegram channel/Medium/Steem) or community channel(Wechat /Reddit/ Forum/Telegram group/Facebook grouop)
messages.form_label_plan: How can your get 2,100,000 BTM to meet the requirement of being a masternode?
messages.form_label_plan_des: Please fill the reliable marketing strategy and plan
messages.form_label_wish: Please fill your vision about Bystack network,feedback plan, governance plan, long-term growth marketing plan for community supporters, and other things you would like to explain to community members:
messages.form_label_wish_des: This will be displayed on the voting site as your masternode candidate manifesto
